Detailed Description

template<typename ClassT>
class Moo::CallbackGraphicsSetting< ClassT >

Implement the GraphicsSetting class, providing a member function callback hook that is called whenever the active option changes.

This class provides the basic graphics settings functionality that is needed by most client subsystems (see romp/flora.cpp for an example).
